title: love app
desc: i do the loove app for my boyfriend

title: Sunrise at the sea
desc: Woke up before anyone else and watched the sun rise over the water. Dad was there, quiet, just us two.

title: Graduation day
desc: Everyone was proud. Mom was crying. I remember the feeling of finally being done.

title: Road trip through the north
desc: Just friends, an old car, no plan. We got lost three times and laughed the entire way.

title: First time I built something real
desc: Stayed up until 4am finishing a project. When it finally worked, I sat alone in the dark and smiled.

title: Ramadan nights with family
desc: After iftar, everyone gathered. My grandmother told old stories. The whole house smelled like coffee.

title: A quiet afternoon that mattered
desc: Nothing happened. I was reading by the window. But I remember feeling completely at peace.
